title: Womens Dress Formal Evening
title_original: Lace Appliques Mother of The Bride Dresses - Sequins 3/4 Sleeves A Line Formal Evening Dress

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Mother of the Bride
items.body: This dress is exactly what I needed for my daughter’s wedding. It’s classy, elegant, and the fit is true to size. Many guests complimented me on it. Read more
items.author: John Kmett

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Formal dress
items.body: Great fabric, fits to size, but lining is very uneven, about 3 inches longer on one side Read more
items.author: Ma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and So Elegant!
items.body: I was nervous about ordering online, but the size chart was accurate. The dress arrived in time for my daughter's wedding. The fabric is high-quality and doesn't wrinkle easily. I felt comfortable and beautiful all night. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Carolyn Kinsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for the Price
items.body: I wasn’t sure what to expect, but this dress exceeded my expectations. The material, stitching, and overall quality are fantastic for the price point. I would definitely recommend it to other mothers preparing for weddings. Read more
items.author: Tyler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Pictured
items.body: The color and material looked just like the photos. It's well-made with neat stitching. I received many compliments. A great find for the price. Read more
items.author: Gina cline

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Pastel Green, Deep Green, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Scarlets, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue, Wisteria. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
